list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a room or building in which goods are manufactured or repaired.
a meeting at which a group of people engage in intensive discussion and activity on a particular subject or project.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a writers' workshop was held on July 25–27
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hội thảo của một nhà văn đã được tổ chức vào ngày 25-27 tháng 7

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: present a performance of (a dramatic work), using intensive group discussion and improvisation in order to explore aspects of the production before formal staging.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the play was workshopped briefly at the Shaw Festival
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vở kịch đã được trang bị một cách nhanh chóng tại Lễ hội Shaw
